title: Clinical factors associated with smoking cessation among smokers with Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease by sex: Longitudinal analyses from French smoking cessation services
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Ingrid Allagbé, Roche Nicolas, Guillaume Airagnes, Limosin Frédéric, Abdel-Ali Boussadi, Anne-Laurence Le Faou
